values: Discern What Pleases God—Personal ObedienceDiscern What Pleases God—Personal Obedience

Not all of our obedience pleases God. If we try to earn our justification or even pay God back, we trample on the greatest achievements of the cross. Not all of our obedience pleases God. If we try to earn our justification or even pay God back, we trample on the greatest achievements of the cross.
